item.title: 'Absurd!' Judge blasts Trump executive order targeting top law firm
item.description: A federal judge angrily tore into President Donald Trump's executive order targeting the top law firm WilmerHale as he struck it down in its entirety.

item.title: Trump threatens to withhold California's federal funding over transgender athlete
item.description: Trump's post targeting California and Gov. Gavin Newsom over a trans athlete comes as he threatens to cancel federal funds over conduct he opposes.

item.title: Walmart fined for shipping realistic toy guns to New York, violating state law

item.title: NPR sues Trump over executive order cutting federal funding
item.description: National Public Radio sued President Donald Trump over his executive order to cease all federal funding for the broadcaster.
